info.title: BART JSON API
info.description: JSON wrapper for the BART transit API.

get.description: Gets the overall BART system status

uri.description: URI of the underlying BART API call

date.description: Date that the status was fetched from BART

time.description: Time that the status was fetched from BART

traincount.description: The number of trains currently operating

message.description: System wide status message, if one applies

get.description: Gets information about elevator outages across the BART system

uri.description: URI of the underlying BART API call

date.description: Date that the status was fetched from BART

time.description: Time that the status was fetched from BART

id.description: The BART Service Announcement ID for this message

station.description: The station code that the status message applies to, or BART for system wide messages

type.description: The message type, for this response will always be ELEVATOR

description.description: Long format text for the elevator status message
description.example: There are three elevators out of service at this time: El Cerrito Plaza S.F./Fremont Platform Elevator, Ashby Street Elevator and Embarcadero Street Elevator. Thank you.

sms_text.description: Short format text for the elevator status message, that will fit in a SMS message
sms_text.example: 3 elevs out of svc PLZA s.f./FRMT plat elev, ASBY st elev and EMBR st elev.

posted.description: Date / time that the message was posted

expires.description: Date / time that the message expires, or blank

message.description: Additional message, expect this to be blank

uri.description: URI of the underlying BART API call

date.description: Date that the service announcements were fetched from BART

time.description: Time that the service announcements were fetched from BART

station.description: Station affected by the announcement, blank if none

description.description: Long format text description of the announcement

sms_text.description: Short format text description of the announcement, fits in an SMS message

message.description: Additional message, expect this to be blank

get.description: Get basic information about all BART stations
Get basic information about a single station
Get real time departure information for all stations
Get real time departure information for a single station
Get station access information for all stations
Get station access information for a single station
Get station information for all stations
Get station information for a single station

parameters.name: fromStation
parameters.description: Station Code for the origin station

parameters.name: toStation
parameters.description: Station Code for the destination station

get.description: Get ticket prices and route between two stations

uri.description: URI of the underlying BART API call

origin.description: Station code for the originating station

destination.description: Station code for the destination station

origin.description: Station code of the originating station

destination.description: Station code of the destination station

fare.description: Base fare for this trip in US Dollars

origTimeDate.description: Date that the trip is on

clipper.description: Discount in US Dollars taken off the fare for paying with a Clipper card

tripTime.description: Not used, expect this to be blank

special_schedule.description: Information that may affect the trip
special_schedule.example: Elevator out for maintenance at El Cerrito Plaza 6/6.

co2_emissions.description: Information about CO2 emissions saved by this trip
co2_emissions.example: CO2 emissions saved by this BART trip: 20.6 pounds. Read more

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of the point to order stations by distance from

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of the point to order stations by distance from

get.description: Get all stations, ordered by distance from a given latitude, longitude point

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of the point to find the closest station to

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of the point to find the closest station to

get.description: Get details of the closest station to a given latitude, longitude point

name.description: The full name of the station

abbr.description: The four character code for the station (API accepts these in both lower and upper case, but always returns them in upper case

address.description: The street address of the station

city.description: The city that the station is in

county.description: The code name of county that the station is in

state.description: The state that the station is in (always CA)

zipcode.description: The zipcode that the station is in

name.description: Name of the station that the departures are from

abbr.description: Four character code name of the station that the departures are from

destination.description: Name of the station that the departing train terminates at

abbreviation.description: Four character code name of the station that the deparing train terminates at

limited.description: Indicates whether this is a limited stop train (1) or an all stops train (0)

minutes.description: Number of minutes until the train departs (trains leaving immediately will show "Leaving" here)

platform.description: Platform number that the train departs from

direction.description: Direction that the train is traveling in

length.description: The number of train cars that make up this train

color.description: The line color that the train is operating on

hexcolor.description: Hex color code for the line color that the train is operating on

bikeflag.description: Flag to indicate whether bikes are allowed on the train (1) or not (0)

parking_flag.description: Indicates whether there is parking (1) at the station, or not (0)

bike_flag.description: Indicates whether bike racks are available (1) at the station, or not (0)

bike_station_flag.description: Indiates whether a bike station is available (1) at the station, or not (0)

locker_flag.description: Indicates whether bike lockers are available (1) at the station, or not (0)

name.description: The full name of the station

abbr.description: The four character code name of the station

entering.description: Access details for entering BART at this station
entering.example:
BART and Caltrain boarding platforms at Millbrae Station are on the ground level. The concourse is elevated.

There are two street-level entrances and two street-level entry elevators at this joint-use BART/Caltrain Station. The BART street entrance and street elevator are on the east entry plaza. The Caltrain street entrance and street elevator are on the west entry plaza. Both street elevators are outside the paid area.

When you exit the street elevator you will arrive on the elevated concourse level outside the paid area where the station agent is located.

To ride, process your ticket and take the platform elevator down to the train boarding area. You will arrive in the middle of the platform boarding area.

exiting.description: Access details for exiting BART at this station
exiting.example:
BART and Caltrain boarding platforms at Millbrae Station are on the ground level. The concourse is elevated.

The platform elevator is in the middle of the boarding area. When you exit the platform elevator you will arrive on the elevated concourse outside the paid area where the station agent is located.

To exit, process your ticket and take the street elevator down to the street. This is a joint-use BART/Caltrain Station: if you are exiting BART you will arrive at the east plaza exit. If you are exiting Caltrain you will arrive at the west plaza exit.

parking.example:
Parking is available at Millbrae Station and there's a $2.00 daily fee. Other options include Monthly Reserved, Daily and Carpool parking. See the parking section for details about each program.

Map of parking locations

fill_time.description: Estimated time that the parking at this station fills up (may be blank)

car_share.description: Unknown at this time, trying to source an example usage for this field

lockers.description: Information about bike lockers at this station.  Will be set if locker_flag is set to 1
lockers.example: 44 shared use electronic lockers are located at this station. Read more about electronic lockers.

bike_station_text.description: Information about the bike station at this station.  Will be set if bike_station_flag is set to 1
bike_station_text.example: Attended bike parking is available on the street level on Shattuck Avenue above the Downtown Berkeley Station. Learn more ...

destinations.description: Information about points of interest local to this station
destinations.example: To find a destination near this station, visit the neighborhood section.

transit_info.description: Information about other public transit available to/from this station
transit_info.example:
Millbrae Station is served by Samtrans and Caltrain which features a convenient cross-platform connection.

Try BART's free trip planning service!
For a personalized trip plan with BART and connecting transit, call the BART Transit Information Center. It's fast, it's easy, and it's tailored just for you!

link.description: A link to the BART web page for this station

name.description: The full name of the station

abbr.description: The four character station code for the station

city.description: The city that the station is in

county.description: The code for the county that the station is located in

state.description: The state that the station is located in (always CA)

zipcode.description: The zipcode that the station is located in

items.description: Name of a Northbound route that passes through this station
Name of a Southbound route that passes through this station
Number of a platform that Northbound trains call at
Number of a platform that Southbound trains call at

platform_info.description: Text displayed on platform level electronic signage
platform_info.example: Always check destination signs and listen for departure announcements.

intro.description: Short text description of the station
intro.example: Daly City, located at the northernmost edge of San Mateo County, is often called the "Gateway to the Peninsula."

cross_street.description: Cross street location description for the station

food.description: Details of food and restaurants nearby the station
food.example: Nearby restaurant reviews from yelp.com

shopping.description: Details of shopping nearby the station
shopping.example: Local shopping from yelp.com

attraction.description: Details of local attractions for this station
attraction.example: More station area attractions from yelp.com

link.description: Link to the BART website page for this station

order.description: The sequence in which trip legs need to be completed to reach the destination

origin.description: The four character station code for the origin station for this leg

destination.description: The four character station code for the destination station for this leg

origTimeMin.description: The time that the leg starts at the originating station

origTimeDate.description: The date that the leg starts at the originating station

destTimeMin.description: The time that the leg arrives at the destination station

destTimeDate.description: The date that the leg arrives at the destination station

line.description: The BART line that this leg is on

bikeflag.description: Flag indicating whether bikes are allowed on this leg (1), or not (0)

trainHeadStation.description: The four character station code for the station that the train for this leg terminates at

originName.description: The full name of the station that this leg originates at

destinationName.description: The full name of the station that this leg ends at

trainHeadStationName.description: The full name of the station that the train for this leg terminates at

name.description: The full name of the station

abbr.description: The four character station code for the station

city.description: The city that the station is in

county.description: The code for the county that the station is located in

state.description: The state that the station is located in (always CA)

zipcode.description: The zipcode that the station is located in

distance.description: Distance in miles between this station and the specified lat/long
